title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Knife River Indian Villages NHS is open year-round to visitors. Visitor Center and Earthlodge Hours:  Summer (Memorial Day-Labor Day): 8:00am - 6:00pm Central Daylight Time Winter (Labor Day-Memorial Day): 8:00am - 4:30pm Central Standard Time   Park trails and grounds are open daily from sunrise until sunset. *Visitor Center and Earthlodge are closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day. Trails and grounds remain open unless indicated in press releases or park alerts.
